login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Log in to your account to continue boosting your career.

signup.title: Create an Account
signup.description: Get started with your AI Career Co-Pilot in seconds.

hero.subtitle: Stop guessing. HireSight analyzes job descriptions against your resume, gives you a clear compatibility score, rewrites your resume, and prepares you for the interview. Your next career move starts here.

features.title: Your Unfair Advantage in the Job Market
features.subtitle: Our platform is designed to give you the edge you need to get hired.

aiFeedback.title: Personalized AI Feedback
aiFeedback.description: Get an instant, unbiased analysis of how your resume matches a job, highlighting your strengths and areas for improvement.

resumeRewrite.title: Instant Resume Rewrite
resumeRewrite.description: With one click, our AI tailors your resume to perfectly match the keywords and requirements of the job you want.

secureData.title: Data Privacy First
secureData.description: Your data is yours. We provide a secure environment without storing your sensitive resume or personal information.

compatibilityScore.title: Clear Compatibility Score
compatibilityScore.description: Understand exactly where you stand with a data-driven score, so you can focus your energy on the right opportunities.

actionableInsights.title: Actionable Insights
actionableInsights.description: Receive a custom action plan and potential interview questions to prepare you for the next steps.

interviewPrep.title: Interview Preparation
interviewPrep.description: Analyze your mock interview performance to gain confidence and polish your answers before the real thing.

input.title: Start Your Analysis
input.subtitle: Provide the job description and your resume. Your AI Co-Pilot will handle the rest.

job.placeholder: Paste the full job description here...

loginPrompt.text: Please log in to run an analysis.

analysis.title: Your Personalized Analysis Report
analysis.loading: Your AI Co-Pilot is analyzing your documents...
analysis.placeholder: Your analysis report will appear here once the analysis is complete.

rewrite.title: Your AI-Optimized Resume
rewrite.subtitle: This resume has been rewritten to highlight your most relevant skills and experiences for this specific role. Copy it or download it to use in your application.

interview.title: Interview Performance Analysis
interview.subtitle: Practice your interview, then paste the transcript to get feedback on your performance.
interview.transcriptPlaceholder: Paste your mock interview transcript here to get feedback...
interview.transcriptInfo: Providing a transcript allows the AI to analyze your communication, clarity, and confidence.

consistencyInfo.title: Interview Performance Analysis
consistencyInfo.intro1: This is one of the most powerful tools on the HireSight platform, designed to help you ace your interview.
consistencyInfo.whatIsItTitle: What is the Interview Performance Analysis?
consistencyInfo.whatIsItP1: It's a deep analysis that the AI performs to compare, verify, and evaluate your performance based on three main sources:

whatIsItSources.source3: The transcript of your mock interview.

consistencyInfo.whatIsItP2: The goal is to go beyond what's on paper and give you actionable feedback on how to present yourself as the perfect candidate for the job.
consistencyInfo.howItWorksTitle: How It Works and What Feedback You'll Get
consistencyInfo.howItWorksP1: You provide the interview transcript, and the AI generates a complete report with the following points:

gapResolutions.title: Gap Resolutions
gapResolutions.description: Checks if your answers effectively clarified the 'Areas for Improvement' identified in the first analysis. The AI tells you if your response was convincing.

performanceScore.title: Performance Score
performanceScore.description: A percentage that measures how well you communicated your skills and experience. A high score means you were clear, confident, and consistent.

clarity.title: Areas to Improve Clarity
clarity.description: Highlights any answers that were vague or inconsistent with your resume, giving you specific examples on how to improve them.

softSkills.title: Soft Skills Analysis
softSkills.description: Based on your language, the AI assesses the soft skills you demonstrated, such as communication, problem-solving, and attitude.

strengths.title: Demonstrated Strengths
strengths.description: Highlights the skills, experiences, or qualities that you communicated effectively, especially ones that weren't obvious on your resume.

missedOpportunities.title: Missed Opportunities
missedOpportunities.description: Identifies important points from your resume that you didn't mention, which could be powerful selling points to include next time.

postInterviewScore.title: Post-Interview Fit Score
postInterviewScore.description: Your initial compatibility score is recalculated based on your interview performance, showing how much you improved your standing.

overallFeedback.title: Overall Feedback
overallFeedback.description: Based on all the data, the AI provides a final, clear performance review: 'Excellent', 'Good', or 'Needs Improvement'.

consistencyInfo.conclusion: Essentially, the Interview Performance Analysis is your personal 'interview coach' ensuring you are as prepared, confident, and effective as possible.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage API Keys
settings.description: Your API keys are stored securely in your browser's local storage and are never sent to our servers. Leave a field blank if you don't use that provider.
settings.openaiKey: API key for models like GPT-4o.
settings.groqKey: API key for LLaMA and Mixtral models on Groq.

gemini.infoMessage: The Gemini API key is configured securely via an environment variable (API_KEY) and cannot be set in the user interface.

aiProvider.title: AI Model Configuration
aiProvider.description: Select the provider and model you wish to use for the analysis. Some providers require an API key in the settings.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the console for details.
error.boundaryMessage: We're sorry, but the application encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.
error.geminiKeyMissing: Google Gemini API Key is missing. It must be configured as an environment variable.
error.openaiKeyMissing: OpenAI API Key is missing. Please add it in the settings.
error.anthropicKeyMissing: Anthropic API Key is missing. Please add it in the settings.
error.groqKeyMissing: Groq API Key is missing. Please add it in the settings.
error.serviceNotInitialized: AI service is not initialized. Please check your API key settings.

tooltips.postInterviewFitScore: This is your final compatibility score, recalculated after considering your interview performance.
tooltips.performanceScore: Measures how well your interview answers aligned with your resume and the job requirements.
tooltips.overallFeedback: An overall verdict on your interview performance.
tooltips.compatibilityGaps: Specific skills or experiences required by the job that were not found in your resume. These are key areas to address in an interview.
tooltips.areasForImprovement: Potential concerns or inconsistencies that you should be prepared to discuss.
